sandy.core.data.BSPNode

type
class
BSP tree node.

Static Variables

makeLazyBSP(default,method) : faces : Array<Polygon> -> threshold : Float -> BSPNode

Creates BSP tree from list of faces without cutting them (hence "lazy"). Faces are ordered by coplanar area.
